name: Metrics Analysis
description: Analyze product metrics and identify trends
prompt_text: Conduct a thorough analysis of the {metric_name} metric for the {product_area} product area over the {time_range} period. Identify statistically meaningful trends, anomalies, and inflection points in the data, and correlate them with known product changes or external factors. Provide a breakdown of contributing factors, segment-level variations, and leading indicators that may explain the observed patterns. Recommend specific actions the product team should take based on the findings, prioritized by expected impact. {context}

variables.name: metric_name
variables.label: Metric Name
variables.placeholder: e.g., Activation Rate, DAU, Revenue per User
